ygData.subject: Re: Combined Weapons?
ygData.msgSnippet: You can buy combines off of gypsies in the Oasis and I think North Karanas. ... From: Juha Palomaa (ECS) [mailto:juha.palomaa@ecs.ericsson.se] Sent: Wednesday,
ygData.messageBody:
You can buy combines off of gypsies in the Oasis and I think North Karanas.

-----Original Message-----
From: Juha Palomaa (ECS) [mailto:juha.palomaa@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 1:49 AM
To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqpaladin] Combined Weapons?


From: "Juha Palomaa (ECS)" <juha.palomaa@...>

Hail,

I am Njelm, a Paladin from the dwarven city of Kaladim. I have felt the need
for a magic one handed weapon and think that the combine longsword would be
nice.
I have heard that these can be bought from gypsies ?? Where do they live ?

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

//Njelm
